metadata.title: Reef Women's Cushion Vista Higher Sandal
features: PLATFORM SANDALS: These sandals take our popular Cushion Vista Hi sandals to a higher level at 2 1/2 inches of height!
TRENDY & COMFORTABLE: Lightweight and durable chunky lug EVA outsole with a 2.5” platform silhouette with exaggerated notch detail.
ALL DAY COMFORT: Our most comfortable footbed yet featuring the perfect blend of cushion and rebound support. This is a wider shape with generous arch support and heel cupping.

BEACH FREELY: REEF encourages people around the world to embrace the spirit of the beach while living by one simple rule: Beach Freely. Our products are designed to make you feel comfortable in any environment, whether you're at the beach or not.
description: If high is good, higher is better, thus we present the Vista Hi 2.5. Our mad popular Vista Hi, all chunky platform adorableness, reaches even more height at 2 1/2 inches! You’ll want to snatch these up quickly.
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "5 x 12 x 6 inches; 11.2 Ounces", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "July 27, 2022", "Manufacturer": "Reef"}
